Package game

Class ActionHandler

java.lang.Object
game.ActionHandler
public abstract class ActionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
Action Handler class Exists to simplify game loop and handle behind scenes computation for player actions
Author:
Alex Burling(arb142)

  • Method Details

    • handle

      public static void handle​(Game.Actions action) throws OutOfActionsException
      Handles all of the actions a player can take Overloaded function signature, call as handle(String action, Item consume) to handle player actions that consume an Item
      Parameters:
      action - String represents player's action
      Throws:
      OutOfActionsException

    • handle

      public static void handle​(Game.Actions action, FarmItem instance) throws OutOfActionsException, InvalidActionException
      Throws:
      OutOfActionsException
      InvalidActionException

    • handle

      public static void handle​(Game.Actions action, FarmItem instance, FarmItem.FarmItems consumeEnum) throws OutOfActionsException, InvalidActionException, InvalidItemException
      Handles all of the actions a player can take that would consume an item. Overloaded function signature, call as handle(String action) to handle player actions that don't consume an item.
      Parameters:
      action - String represents player's action
      consume - FarmItem FarmItem to be consumed with action
      Throws:
      OutOfActionsException
      InvalidActionException
      InvalidItemException
